ygData.subject: Re: Equipment?
ygData.msgSnippet: Here is Yilari at level 10. Wrists= leather armbands Arms = Leather again Shoulders = Leather Back = Cloth Chest = Leather Ears = One gold earring found on orc
ygData.messageBody:
Here is Yilari at level 10.

Wrists= leather armbands
Arms = Leather again
Shoulders = Leather
Back = Cloth
Chest = Leather
Ears = One gold earring found on orc
Face = Cloth veil
Head = Cloth
Fingers = Two +2 wisdom rings
Hands = Rawhide gloves
Neck = Leather gorget
Legs = Leather
Feet = Bronze
Waist = Leather
Primary Weapon = Cracked Staff or Tarnished Mace
Shield + Round Plain





> From: "Marquardt, Kris L." <Kris_Marquardt@...>
>
> Looking at that list I don't feel quite so bad. Here is mine at 18th
level.
>
> Wrists = Bronze Bracers (x2)
> Arms = Barbed +2 dex
> Shoulders = Bronze
> Back = Leather Cloak
> Chest = Dwarven Ringmail Tunic +8 vs Heat, Cold & Magic
> Ears = +2 Agility Earings (x2)
> Face = Silver Ruby Veil +4wis +4 str
> Head = Bronze
> Fingers = +2 Wisdom Rings (x2)
> Hands = Raw Hide Gloves
> Feet = Scarab Boots
> Legs = Ringmail Legs
> Neck = Bronze
> Waist = cloth rope
> Primary Wpn = Shining Star of Light (1HB)
> Shield = Shiny Brass Shield
> Secondary Wpn =Bloodforge Hammer (2HB)
>
> Heisler, Cleric of Brell
> E'ci
> Armigers of Mirth
>
>
>
